pageProduct.name: Antipodes Natural Vanilla Pod Day Cream Discovery Set
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Cult favourites, together at last.
Hosanna H20 Skin-Plumping Serum is a water-charged and oil-free bioactive organic serum that immediately quenches thirsty skin by delivering pure hydration to skin cells. Vanilla Pod Hydrating Day Cream feels beautifully fresh on your face. With a base of nutrient-rich avocado oil, it features antibacterial manuka honey, and captures the anti-ageing benefits of Vinanza® Grape, a revolutionary antioxidant from sauvignon blanc grape seeds. Restore your skin by night with Avocado Pear Nourishing Night Cream, scientifically shown to enhance collagen production to improve skin elasticity. With avocado oil, manuka honey, marigold and Vinanza® Grape, wake to renewed skin.

Warnings

External Application Only. Patch Test Prior To Use. In Unlikely Event Of Negative Reaction Discontinue Use And Consult Health Practitioner. Recyclable Glass. Handle With Care. Store In Cool Dark Place Below 21°C. Colour And Clarity May Vary Between Products Due To Pure Natural Content. Gold Flakes May Dissolve And Are Not Always Visible. Love Nature

Common Uses

Skincare

Ingredients

 Vanilla Pod: Aqua (water), glycerine, squalane (olive) extract, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Macadamia integrifolia (macadamia) nut oil, Rosa canina (rosehip) oil, cetearyl alcohol, Persea gratissima (avocado pear) oil, tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, Macropiper excelsum (kawakawa) leaf extract, dehydroacetic acid; benzyl alcohol, lecithin, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Grape) seed extract, Leptospermum scoparium (mel) manuka honey. essential oil fragrances of vanilla pod and mandarin: coumarin†, d-Limonene†, linalool†. Hosanna: Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) distillate*, aqua (Waiwera® artesian) water, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern leaf) extract, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza Grape® grape seed) extract, Naticide® (natural preservative), caprylic/capric triglyceride, xanthan gum, essential oil fragrances of French rose & cardamon: benzyl benzoate†, cinnamyl alcohol†, citral†, citronellol†, d-Limonene†, eugenol†, farnesol†, geraniol†, linanool†.
†  Component of essential oil
* Certified organic ingredient          
   Product certified organic by BioGro
     Avocado Pear: Aqua (water), Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, squalane (vegetable) extract, Persea gratissima (avocado) oil, Leptospermum scoparium mel (manuka) honey, Macadamia ternifolia (macadamia nut) oil, Calendula officinalis (calendula) oil, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, lecithin (vegetable) extract, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, calcium gluconate, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza®  Grapegrape seed) extract, tocopherol (Vitamin E), essential oil fragrances of sandalwood, ylang ylang and patchouli: benzyl benzoate†, benzyl salicylate†, citral†, d-Limonene†, linalool†, eugenol†, farnesol†, geraniol†, isoeugenol†.                     
† Component of essential oil

Directions

Apply caressing into your face, neck and décolletage after cleansing and toning.
